section.heading: Rules; authority to execute contracts and grants.

para.text: The Mayor, pursuant to subchapter I of Chapter 5 of Title 2, shall issue rules to implement the provisions of this subchapter.
The Mayor may execute contracts, grants, and other legally binding documents to implement the provisions of this subchapter.
